dk.aau.cs.giraf.categorygame

Class GameConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.aau.cs.giraf.categorygame.GameConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class GameConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    This class contains all information of a game configuration. It contains the id of the child associated with it, aswell as the guardian id, and a list of stations.
    See Also:
    StationConfiguration
